questions.question: Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?

answers.answer: In 10 years time, I imagine that I will finish my studies and I'll have a job. I would like to work in human management. I will also have my own house but I don't know yet if I'll already have a children. One of my dream is to have my own horse, so I hope that I will have it in 10 years time.
